GlobalChangeSpec.Name: Add Ship To On Catalog Items Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: HEIFERNET\khamling
GlobalChangeSpec.DisplayName: Add Ship To On Catalog Items Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_ADD_SHIPTO_CATALOGITEMS (
@CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @CATALOGREVENUESELECTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ) as set nocount off;
declare @I_MAX integer declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate DECLARE @CATALOGREVENUESELECTION TABLE (id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY);
INSERT INTO @CATALOGREVENUESELECTION SELECT id FROM dbo.Ufn_idsetreader_getresults_guid(@CATALOGREVENUESELECTIONID)
declare @T table ( PK int identity(1,1), CATALOGREVENUEID uniqueidentifier ) declare @I int = 1
insert into @T select CR.ID from dbo.USR_CATALOGREVENUE CR where id in (select id from @CATALOGREVENUESELECTION)
select @I_MAX = count(*) from @T
declare @MYCATALOGREVENUEID uniqueidentifier declare @REVENUEID uniqueidentifier
DECLARE @CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier DECLARE @CRID uniqueidentifier DECLARE @CRADDRESSID uniqueidentifier DECLARE @CRNAME nvarchar(100) DECLARE @CRFIRSTNAME nvarchar(100) DECLARE @CRLASTNAME nvarchar(100) DECLARE @CRADDR1 nvarchar(100) DECLARE @CRADDR2 nvarchar(100) DECLARE @CRCITY nvarchar(100) DECLARE @CRSTATEID uniqueidentifier DECLARE @CRZIP nvarchar(10) DECLARE @CRCOUNTRYID uniqueidentifier DECLARE @CRSHIPPINGOPTION nvarchar(150) DECLARE @CRSHIPPINGPRICE money --DECLARE @OMITFROMVALIDATION bit --DECLARE @ADDRESSTYPE nvarchar(100) DECLARE @LOOKUPID nvarchar(20)
DECLARE @UMX_CODE_ID uniqueidentifier select top 1 @UMX_CODE_ID = CAST(id AS nvarchar(36)) FROM usr_catalogitemattribute WHERE catalogcode='UMX' and unit like 'Honor Card%'
--BEGIN LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE while @I <= @I_MAX begin select @MYCATALOGREVENUEID = CATALOGREVENUEID from @T where PK = @I
set @crid = null set @craddressid = null set @crname = '' set @crfirstname = '' set @crlastname = '' set @craddr1 = '' set @craddr2 = '' set @crcity = '' set @crstateid = null set @crzip = '' set @crcountryid = null set @crshippingoption = '' set @crshippingprice = 0
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- create new CATALOGREVENUE records with new codes and correct quantities, which were calculated in SELECT statement above. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --begin try ------------ Do global change action here --------------- --------------------------------------------------------- select @REVENUEID = ft.id, @CONSTITUENTID = ft.constituentid from usr_catalogrevenue cr inner join financialtransaction ft on cr.revenueid = ft.id where cr.id = @MYCATALOGREVENUEID
select top 1 @crid = cr.id, @craddressid = cr.addressid, @crname = cr.shiptofirstname + ' ' + cr.shiptolastname, @crfirstname = cr.shiptofirstname, @crlastname = cr.shiptolastname, @craddr1 = cr.shiptoaddress1, @craddr2 = cr.shiptoaddress2, @crcity = cr.shiptocity, @crstateid = cr.shiptostateid, @crzip = cr.shiptozip, @crcountryid = cr.shiptocountryid, @crshippingoption = CAST(cr.catalogitemattributeid AS nvarchar(36)), @crshippingprice = cr.price from usr_catalogrevenue cr inner join usr_catalogtypecode ct on cr.catalogtypeid=ct.id where ct.description='Shipping' and isnull(cr.shiptoaddress1,'') <> '' --make sure something is in the shipping address line 1, or else pull bill to from cm. below and cr.revenueid = @REVENUEID --'03247649-CDF6-4E1E-8F12-F568DCAD93E2'
if @crid is not null begin --@MYCATALOGREVENUEID is current guid from selection. @crid is quid of shipping line. update usr_catalogrevenue set shiptofirstname=@crfirstname, shiptolastname=@crlastname, shiptoname=@crname, shiptoaddress1=@craddr1, shiptoaddress2=@craddr2, shiptocity=@crcity, shiptostateid=@crstateid, shiptozip=@crzip, shiptocountryid=@crcountryid, shippingoption=@crshippingoption, shippingprice=@crshippingprice, addressid=@craddressid where usr_catalogrevenue.id=@MYCATALOGREVENUEID end else begin select top 1 @craddressid = cm.addressid, @crname = isnull(cm.name,''), @crfirstname = isnull(cm.firstname,''), @crlastname = isnull(cm.keyname,''), @craddr1 = isnull(cm.addressline1,''), @craddr2 = isnull(cm.addressline2,''), @crcity = isnull(cm.city,''), @crstateid = (select id from state where abbreviation = cm.stateid_abbreviation and countryid= (select id from country where abbreviation = cm.countryid_abbreviation)), @crzip = isnull(cm.postcode,''), @crcountryid = (select id from country where abbreviation = cm.countryid_abbreviation), @crshippingoption = isnull(@UMX_CODE_ID,''), @crshippingprice = 0 from v_query_constituentmarketing cm where constituentid = @constituentid
update usr_catalogrevenue set shiptofirstname=@crfirstname, shiptolastname=@crlastname, shiptoname=@crname, shiptoaddress1=@craddr1, shiptoaddress2=@craddr2, shiptocity=@crcity, shiptostateid=@crstateid, shiptozip=@crzip, shiptocountryid=@crcountryid, shippingoption=@crshippingoption, shippingprice=@crshippingprice, addressid=@craddressid where usr_catalogrevenue.id=@MYCATALOGREVENUEID end --------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------
--end try --begin catch -- exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; -- return 1; --end catch
set @I = @I + 1 set @NUMBEREDITED = @NUMBEREDITED + 1 end --END LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
